Contents: Aquaius can't take the trauma. Its form ripples and disperses!
Aquaius' infinite despair cannot be contained!
The very fabric of reality is tearing at the seams!
You are powerless, hero... All that you have fought for will be lost in the infinite abyss!
Omnicide's infinite dread cannot be contained!
The very fabric of reality is tearing at the seams!
You are powerless, hero... All that you have fought for will be lost in the infinite abyss!
Slag Fury's infinite rage cannot be contained!
The very fabric of reality is tearing at the seams!
You are powerless, hero... All that you have fought for will be lost in the infinite abyss!
Slag Fury fades out of existence...
